attributes.action: Lower womens routine breast screening age to 35-40 instead of 50
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lower the age of routine breast screening for women in the UK to 35/40 instead of 50. Many women below the age of 50 are diagnosed with breast cancer every year in this country, "this has to stop", lives will be saved if this happens and many mastectomys avoided!
